text: adam-ui jasondeul-iyeo satan-i neohuideul-ui seonjoleul yuhoghayeo geudeul ui uisang-eul ppaeas-a geudeul-ui bukkeuleo un gos-eul deuleonaegehayeo neohui bumo leul cheongug-eulobuteo sogbaghayeoss-euni geuga neohuileul yuhoghaji anihadologhala geuwa geuligo geuui mulineun neohuiga geudeul-eul bol su eobsneun gos-eseo neohuileul bogo issnola sillo hananim eun mid-eum-i eobsneun geudeul-egeman satan eul jeog-eulo dueossnola
